page.title: 10TOURISM
page.content: Although the area lies within the Brecon Beacons National Park, there is little tourist pressure upon this area. Cwm Treweren contains the trunk road A 4067, which is an important link between Swansea and the Midlands, North Wales and Northern England. However most traffic passes through the area without stopping. Cwm Crai is only served by narrow country lanes. There is no holiday accommodation in the area. The area is less attractive for walk- ing than is the country further east. Fforest Fach is much lower than the main summits of the Brecon Beacons so that there is little merit in mak- ing the ascent. However it is a surperbly fine viewpoint.
